alert.note: Alert for Hill (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 07 at 12:53AM CDT until May 07 at 1:45AM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: The National Weather Service in Fort Worth has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Hill County in central Texas... * Until 145 AM CDT. * At 1253 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Whitney, or 9 miles west of Hillsboro, moving southeast at 20 mph. HAZARD...Quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Damage to vehicles is possible. * Locations impacted include... Hillsboro, Whitney, Itasca, Covington, Bynum, Carl`s Corner, Aquilla Lake, Lake Whitney State Park, Lake Whitney, Abbott, Mertens, Aquilla, Lovelace, Brandon, Irene, Mayfield, Osceola, Woodbury and Peoria. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...<50 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection get inside a sturdy structure and stay away from windows.
